title: Show/Hide the Blocks Tray
description: Find and use the tool on the Quorum Blocks toolbar that shows and hides the block tray. If you need a hint use the hint button located below the Quorum Blocks tool. Then go to the next problem.
hint: You can use the mouse or the keyboard to press the first button on the toolbar. When using the keyboard, use TAB to go to the show or hide button and press ENTER. There is also a shortcut key of CTRL + SHIFT + X that can be used when you are working in the block editor.
